select
from monthly_self_check where enterprise_id = #{monthlySelfCheckParam.enterpriseId} AND DATE_FORMAT(check_time,"%Y") = DATE_FORMAT(#{monthlySelfCheckParam.searchTime},"%Y")

select
from monthly_self_check where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} AND DATE_FORMAT(check_time,"%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(#{searchDate},"%Y-%m")
